com.dukascopy.api

Interface IClientInfo


  • public interface IClientInfo
    Contains the account's clients information.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBalance()
      Returns client's investment balance in the trader base currency.
      The last client investment balance available is the balance for the previous end-of-day processing.
      double getBaseEquity()
      Returns current client's base investment equity (No open Profit/Loss) in the trader base currency.
      Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds.
      java.lang.String getClientId()
      Returns client id
      IAccount.AccountState getClientState()
      Returns client state
      java.util.Currency getCurrency()
      Returns client currency
      double getEquity()
      Returns current client's investment equity in the trader base currency.
      Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds
      double getRatio()
      Returns the client's market share - a double value with a positive sign, greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than or equal to 1.0.
      double getStopLossLevel()
      Returns client's equity stop loss level.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientId

        java.lang.String getClientId()
        Returns client id
        Returns:
        client id

      • getClientState

        IAccount.AccountState getClientState()
        Returns client state
        Returns:
        client state

      • getCurrency

        java.util.Currency getCurrency()
        Returns client currency
        Returns:
        client currency

      • getStopLossLevel

        double getStopLossLevel()
        Returns client's equity stop loss level. The equity stop loss level is in the client base currency and define an absolute level of equity from or under which the client will be stopped and their exposures closed.
        Returns:
        client's equity stop loss level

      • getEquity

        double getEquity()
        Returns current client's investment equity in the trader base currency.
        Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds
        Returns:
        equity

      • getBaseEquity

        double getBaseEquity()
        Returns current client's base investment equity (No open Profit/Loss) in the trader base currency.
        Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every 5 seconds.
        Returns:
        base equity - equity without open positions' profit/loss

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Returns client's investment balance in the trader base currency.
        The last client investment balance available is the balance for the previous end-of-day processing.
        Returns:
        balance

      • getRatio

        double getRatio()
        Returns the client's market share - a double value with a positive sign, greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than or equal to 1.0.
        Returns:
        the client's market share x satisfying to 0.0 <= x <= 1.0 (multiplied by 100 shows the active client ratio in percentages)
